description: Finds rows in a datatable that match a search pattern.

input.name: column
input.description: The name of column in the datatable to be searched.

input.name: pattern
input.description: A text or a regular expression to be searched for within the list. Regular expressions must be wrapped with / character (e.g. /.*/).

output.name: data
output.description: A datatable with the rows that match the testing pattern.

output.name: complementary
output.description: A datatable with the rows that do not match the testing pattern.
